description: Update an existing open door team membership.

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.validation: Must be provided together with --organization-id. Allowed values: brokers, truckers, customers. Server validates organization_type as Broker, Trucker, or Customer.

permissions: Admins can update open door team memberships. Non-admins can update if they could create the membership or they are the membership user.
side_effects: Updates an open door team membership.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one updatable relationship flag is required. If --membership is set, it cannot be empty. If either --organization-type or --organization-id is set, both are required together. Server validation enforces organization_type as Broker, Trucker, or Customer; membership must be related to the organization or its broker; and membership/organization cannot be changed once persisted.
